# Investor Relations

[ Minimum 15 minutes delayed. Source: LSEG  ](https://ir.suncartech.com/stock/stock-quote-chart)

## About SunCar

Founded in 2007, Auto Services Group Limited (“SunCar”) is transforming the customer journey for car insurance and aftermarket services in China, the largest passenger vehicle market in the world. SunCar develops and operates online platforms that seamlessly connect drivers with a wide range of automotive services and insurance coverage options from a nationwide network of provider partners. As a result, SunCar has established itself as the leader in China for B2B automotive after-sales services and the online insurance market, especially for electric vehicles. The Company’s multi-tenant, cloud-based platform empowers its enterprise clients to optimally access and manage their customer database and offerings and gain access to hundreds of services from thousands of providers in a single application.
